# Luxury 5 Star Hotels & Resorts in India - Zuri Hotels & Resorts

Welcome to one of the best Luxury 5 star hotels & resorts in India for an experience ‘far beyond expectations’. And discover the true meaning of ‘Zuri’.

## Resorts Overview

### [The Zuri Kumarakom, Kerala Resort & Spa](https://www.thezurihotels.com/lake-resorts-in-kumarakom)
A luxurious resort located in Kumarakom, Kerala, offering a serene environment and a range of wellness services, including Ayurvedic treatments.

### [The Zuri White Sands, Goa Resort & Casino](https://www.thezurihotels.com/beach-resorts-in-goa)
This resort combines luxury with entertainment, featuring a casino and direct access to beautiful beaches in Goa.

### [The Zuri Whitefield, Bengaluru](https://www.thezurihotels.com/hotels-in-bengaluru)
A premium hotel in Bengaluru, known for its modern amenities and proximity to the city's business districts.

### [Stay Offers](https://www.thezurihotels.com/offers/stay-offers)

Discover exclusive dining experiences and offers available at Zuri Hotels, enhancing your culinary journey.

### [Ayurveda Packages](https://www.thezurihotels.com/offers/ayurveda-package)
Specialized wellness packages focusing on traditional Ayurvedic treatments, available at Zuri Kumarakom.
